settings.subtext_selling: Due to high demand, limited quantities available
settings.text_guarantee: We Want You To Love Your New Plushie. If You're Not Completely Satisfied, Return It For A Full Refund. Shopping With Us Is 100% Risk-Free.

settings.title: Irresistibly Soft & Huggable
settings.text: Made with premium ultra-soft fabrics and filled with elastic cotton, every plushie is perfectly squishable — ideal for cuddling, squeezing, or doubling as your new favorite pillow.

settings.title: Adorably Detailed
settings.text: Every stitch is crafted with care to bring each character to life. These aren't just plushies — they're little companions you'll actually want on display.

settings.title: Built to Last
settings.text: Reinforced seams and durable materials mean these plushies hold up to everything — from enthusiastic kids to playful pets. Love them hard; they can take it.

settings.title: Why our plushies are the best

settings.heading: Can´t decide!
settings.text: Gift cards are a experience, having the fun of looking at cute plushies and pick the ones they love without paying is truly amazing!

settings.heading: Stitch loves to cuddle
settings.text: A giant and fluffy monster to protect and love you!!

settings.heading: Mr. Potato is mad cute
settings.text:
Who doesn't love a good fluffy potato.

biting is optional but not recommended!!
